label_invitation_card_quote:
We are very pleased to invite you to be an integral part of our big day.
Your gracious presence is highly solicited.
label_venue_address_1: Jl. Let. Jend. MT. Haryono Kav 2 - 3,
quran_ar_rum_30_12: ‎وَمِنْ اٰيٰتِهٖٓ اَنْ خَلَقَ لَكُمْ مِّنْ اَنْفُسِكُمْ اَزْوَاجًا لِّتَسْكُنُوْٓا اِلَيْهَا وَجَعَلَ بَيْنَكُمْ مَّوَدَّةً وَّرَحْمَةً ۗاِنَّ فِيْ ذٰلِكَ لَاٰيٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يَّتَفَكَّرُوْنَ
quran_ar_rum_30_12_translation: “And one of His signs is that He created for you spouses from among yourselves so that you may find comfort in them. And He has placed between you compassion and mercy. Surely in this are signs for people who reflect.”
msg_wish_placeholder_help_text: Please write your wishes here, max. 500 characters
label_love_gift_quote: Without diminishing respect, for those who wish to give a token of love towards the bride and groom, you can use the virtual account below.
label_thank_you: Thank you for being part of our big day!
msg_thank_you_responding: Thank you for responding to our invitation.
msg_thank_you_attending: Thank you, we are looking forward to welcome you at our wedding.
msg_qrcode_tooltip_help: This QR code is used for registration at guestbook and collecting souvenir. If you can not use the QR code, please use this code or mention your name as backup to our guestbook team on the day of the event.
msg_qrcode_description: Please use the QR below for the guest book at the event later, thank you.
msg_alert_sharing_clipboard: URL is successfully copied to clipboard. You can share it by pasting it in other apps.
